original_title: Princess Anne concludes 3-day official visit to Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Her Royal Highness Princess Anne, the Princess Royal of the United Kingdom, concluded her three-day official visit to Sri Lanka and departed the island on Saturday (13) morning.
She left the country aboard the UL-505 aircraft of SriLankan Airlines.
She also met President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the President’s House in Colombo.
The trip coincides with the 75th anniversary of bilateral relations between the United Kingdom and Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka intensifies Operation Yukthiya with Police deployment surge and stricter legal oversight.
Sri Lankan workers of two closed-down Jordan garment factories to be repatriated after legal proceedings
Sri Lanka Air Force launches investigations into Mi-17 helicopter accident
